org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4 0/ selected items for your convenience materials 10-20g each 8ply acrylic in black white red blue dark grey purple pink polyester fibrefill tools and notions 3 0mm crochet hook stitch marker optional wool or tapestry needle pattern notes uk crochet symbols are used throughout this pattern see http //www simplycrochetmag co uk/2013/07/04/uk-and-us-crochet-conversion- chart/ for conversions gauge is not critical but should be tight to prevent fibrefill leaking stitches used slip_stitch double_crochet half_double_crochet invisible decrease invdec magic_ring © akabekobotan 2023 invisible decrease invdec tutorial with video https //bellacococrochet com/invisible-decrease/ whipped back stitch tutorial https //www embroidery rocksea org/stitch/back- stitch/whipped-back-stitch/ where indicated use the invisible fasten_off to ensure the edge is neat http //www stitch-story com/2010/12/invisible-fasten-off-one-of-my-favorite html you can use any yarn with this project however use a smaller hook than recommended to keep gauge tight project is approximately 7 cm in diameter when made as directed with 8ply acrylic yarn try making a jungle ball with camo patterned yarn use aran weight or heavier yarn if you want bigger balls i said what i said a poké ball body start with red yarn foundation 6 st magic_ring round 1 2dc in each st 12 st round 2 *2dc in 1 st double_crochet* repeat ** to end 18 st round 3 *2dc in 1 st 2dc* repeat ** to end 24 st round 4 *2dc in 1 st 3dc* repeat ** to end 30 st round 5 *2dc in 1 st 4dc* repeat ** to end 36 st round 6-7 double_crochet to end of round 36 st round 8 *2dc in 1 st 5dc* repeat ** to end 42 st round 9 double_crochet to end of round change to black yarn 42 st round 10 double_crochet to end of round change to white yarn 42 st round 11-12 double_crochet to end of round 42 st round 13 *inv decrease 5dc* repeat ** to end 36 st q11 0061 round 14-15 double_crochet to end of round 36 st round 16 *inv decrease 4dc* repeat ** to end 30 st round 17 *inv decrease 3dc* repeat ** to end 24 st round 18 *inv decrease 2dc* repeat ** to end 18 st stuff with fibrefill continue adding stuffing while working the last few rounds if needed round 19 *double_crochet inv decrease* repeat ** to end 12 st round 20 inv decrease to end of round break yarn leaving a long tail and fasten_off 6 st finishing using a yarn needle run the yarn through the front loops of the last 6 stitches and pull tight to close weave in end button start with white yarn note this part is not worked in a spiral but uses slip stitches to join rounds foundation ch2 does not count as a stitch 10 half_double_crochet magic_ring slip_stitch to first stitch of round invisible fasten_off © akabekobotan 2023 round 1 join black yarn to any
